Statute.Title: Canada-Newfoundland and Labrador Atlantic Accord Implementation Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Accord atlantique Canada — Terre-Neuve-et-Labrador, Loi de mise en oeuvre de l’)

Section.Text: 2004, c. 22, s. 6; 2007, c. 29, s. 78 (but s. 78 repealed by 2007, c. 35, s. 169 before coming into force), c. 35, ss. 172 and 174; repealed, 2015, c. 4, s. 69

General.Text: General, 2014, c. 13, ss. 14(E) and 32(E); ss. 116 and 117 (regulations)
General, added, 2024, c. 20, s. 18 (heading after s. 30)
General, 2024, c. 20, s. 74 (heading of Division II of Part III)

Transitional.Text: Transitional, 2007, c. 29, s. 83 (but s. 83 repealed by 2007, c. 35, s. 170)
Transitional, 2014, c. 13, ss. 53 (s. 53(5) as amended by 2018, c. 27, s. 179) and 54

CIF.Text: CIF, 1987, c. 3, s. 239(2) states that ss. 211, 234 & 235 are applicable to taxation years commencing after a day to be fixed by proclamation); Act, except Division VIII of Part II and ss. 207 and 208, proclaimed in force 04.04.87 see SI/87‑88; Division VIII of Part II proclaimed in force 20.05.88 see SI/88‑102; ss. 207 and 208 in force 23.01.96 see SI/96‑20
CIF, 1988, c. 28, ss. 256 to 262 in force 22.12.89 see SI/90‑9
CIF, 1990, c. 41 in force 09.11.90 see SI/90‑169
CIF, 1991, c. 46 in force 01.06.92 see SI/92‑90
CIF, 1991, c. 49, ss. 237(1) deemed in force 27.03.87 see ss. 237(2)
CIF, 1991, c. 50, ss. 23 and 24 in force 15.09.92 see SI/92‑151
CIF, 1992, c. 1, s. 144 (Sch. VII, item 6)(F) in force on assent 28.02.92
CIF, 1992, c. 35, ss. 44 to 83 in force 01.09.92 see SI/92‑154
CIF, 1993, c. 47, ss. 6 to 10 in force 30.06.93 see SI/93‑149; s. 18 in force on assent 23.06.93
CIF, 1994, c. 24, s. 34(2)(F) in force on assent 23.06.94
CIF, 1994, c. 26, ss. 11(F) to 15(F) in force on assent 23.06.94
CIF, 1998, c. 15, s. 18 in force on assent 11.06.98
CIF, 1999, c. 31, s. 29 in force on assent 17.06.99
CIF, 2001, c. 26, s. 324 in force on assent 01.11.2001; s. 280 in force 01.07.2007 see SI/2007-65
CIF, 2004, c. 22, s. 6 in force on assent 14.05.2004
CIF, 2007, c. 29, s. 80 in force on assent 22.06.2007

Item.Text: — s. 79 and 82 deemed to have come into force 01.04.2010 see s. 84 as amended by 2007, c. 35, s. 171 and Canada Gazette, Part I, 14.01.2012, Vol. 146, No. 2, p. 26

CIF.Text: CIF, 2007, c. 35, ss. 169 to 171 and 174 in force on assent 14.12.2007;

Item.Text: — s. 172 deemed to have come into force 01.04.2010 see s. 175 and Canada Gazette, Part I, 14.01.2012, Vol. 146, No. 2, p. 26

CIF.Text: CIF, 2015, c. 4, ss. 117 and 118 in force on assent 26.02.2015;

Item.Text: — ss. 52(2) and 58(2) to (4) in force 26.02.2020 or on any earlier day or days that may be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 119(2).

CIF.Text: CIF, 2017, c. 9, s. 55 in force on assent 19.06.2017
CIF, 2017, c. 20, s. 454 in force on assent 22.06.2017
CIF, 2018, c. 27, s. 179 in force on assent 13.12.2018; ss. 176 and 177 in force 01.01.2019 see SI/2019-25
CIF, 2021, c. 10, ss. 1 and 3 in force on assent 03.06.2021
CIF, SOR/2022-106, in force 30.07.2022, see s. 2

CIF, 2024, c. 20, ss. 1 to 106 come into force the day on which the definition “Regulator” is added to s. 2 of the Canada-Newfoundland and Labrador Atlantic Accord Implementation Newfoundland and Labrador Act, c. C-2 of the Revised Statutes of Newfoundland and Labrador, 1990 see SI/2025-22 (02.06.2025)
CIF, 2024, c. 30, ss. 8 and 9 in force on assent 27.11.2024, except,

Item.Text: — s. 38 in force on assent 27.11.2024 (Coordinating amendment - condition deemed never to have met its effects)
